channel.title: Structural Solutions and snapping
channel.description: what is meant to snap to what in this mod? I've been tinkering with some of the I-beams to use as supports for my buildings, but there seems to be less points of connection than I thought. specifically, I seem to be unable to have anything snap to the "legs" of the X-Sections (both of them)

item.title: Structural Solutions and snapping
item.dc:creator: @Justin_Ullinskey Justin Ullinskey
item.description:
@Justin_Ullinskey wrote:

what is meant to snap to what in this mod? I’ve been tinkering with some of the I-beams to use as supports for my buildings, but there seems to be less points of connection than I thought. specifically, I seem to be unable to have anything snap to the “legs” of the X-Sections (both of them)
